depositBatchERC1155Token(address,address.notice: Transfer a batch of ERC-1155 tokens of multiple types to an application contract and add an input to the application's input box to signal such operation. The caller must enable approval for the portal to manage all of their tokens beforehand, by calling the `setApprovalForAll` function in the token contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows anyone to perform batch transfers of ERC-1155 tokens to an application contract while informing the off-chain machine.
